page.title: 13Dartmouth Harbour
page.content: First the assistant harbour master told us about the{big ships.}The maximum length of the boats is 510 feet,approx.19000 tons.A boat 400 feet long can just turn round on the river. The harbour will only accept clean cargo ships.They need to give 2 weeks' notice before they come into harbour, except the Navy.{Navigation.}Two bouys Checkstone and Castle Ledge have had new red,white and green lights. The lighthouse has been resited so ships can only see the light 10 miles out to sea instead of 12 miles,some dangerous rocks are not marked{Facts.}Hydrofoils but no hovercrafts allowed,6knots limit,depth of water 24-35ft,width of harbour 1/2 mile,there is access to an oil boom.There are about 2500 boats moored here(13 pleasure and 500 fishing boats),about 500 extra per week visit in summer.
